name: Crawler
setup: Four-legged creature with multiple joints moving over a flat surface.
goal: Move in a target direction at the requested speed without falling.

agents.description: Ten independent crawler agents using the same policy.

terms: Reward increases when body velocity matches the target velocity.
Reward increases when body orientation aligns with the goal direction.
Rewards are combined so the agent must satisfy speed and alignment together.

behavior_parameters.vector_observation_space: High-dimensional vector of joint positions, rotations, velocities, and body acceleration.
behavior_parameters.actions: 20 continuous actions controlling target rotations for the joints.
